introPage.heroTitle: Peter Pan's Flutter Cross-Platform App Development
introPage.heroLead: Tailored for liberal arts students, learn programming from scratch and happily build Apps!
heroLines: Learn the latest technologies in Flutter cross-platform App development,
become a cool Flutter App development wizard,
and achieve your second life in App work, freelancing, and entrepreneurship!
learnItems: Independently develop Flutter cross-platform Apps, publish to App Store / Google Play.
Learn the latest Dart and Flutter SDK.
Design iOS / Android App interfaces using Flutter.
Develop over ten engaging Apps, applying common technologies such as RESTful API integration, data storage, animations, and state management.
Master development tools: VS Code, Android Studio, Firebase Studio.

infoPage.heading: Course Information
infoPage.desc: Peter Pan's latest Flutter App course collaborates with
infoPage.descEnd: , starting February 2025. Interested? Check it out!

cards.title: Schedule
lines: 30 hours (classroom + live stream) plus 6 extra hours online

cards.title: Location
lines: 7F, No. 131, Songjiang Rd., Zhongshan Dist., Taipei

cards.title: Live Stream & Recording
lines: Attend in-class or study from home and review anytime

featuresPage.heading: Features
featuresPage.desc: Building complete, production-ready Flutter Apps step by step

items.title: Learn the Latest Dart and Flutter SDK
body: New technologies are not only powerful but also easier to learn. Starting App development now is much easier than before, saving you from many detours.

items.title: Live Streaming and Unlimited Recording Review
body: Live streaming is provided so you can attend class from home. In-class students can also enjoy clear screen views via live stream regardless of seating position. Combined with recordings, you can review every detail of the course anytime after class. After the course ends, recordings remain available indefinitely.

items.title: Develop Ten Complete Apps
body: Build e-book Apps, drink ordering Apps, and food journal Apps from scratch. ( <link1>Peter Pan treats you to drinks after completing the drink ordering App assignment.</link1>)

items.title: Course TA: LINE Messages and Pre/Post-Class Consultations
body: The biggest benefit of taking a course is having someone to ask when you're stuck. <link1>You can ask Peter Pan questions via LINE and FB anytime, and book face-to-face discussions 1 hour before class</link1>. Even after the course ends, you can still ask because Peter Pan will be your lifelong friend and TA!

items.title: Fun and Engaging Teaching
body: Peter Pan will help you understand App development through lively teaching and dad jokes. (See <link1>student testimonials about the fun classroom experience</link1>)

items.title: Well-Designed Exercises and Assignments
body: Through beautifully designed in-class exercises and homework, students stay motivated during and after class, creating beautiful Apps worth sharing on IG. (Special thanks to <link1>designer friends who collaborated on teaching materials</link1>, and <link2>alumni who generously shared</link2> their beautiful assignments for juniors to learn from.)

items.title: Blog: Document 10 Weeks of App Development Growth
body: Share and document your App development growth on a blog. For the benefits of blogging while learning App development, see <link1>iOS App Developer Writer Program</link1>.

items.title: AI-Integrated Teaching and Learning
body: The course integrates amazing AI programming assistants: ChatGPT, Firebase Studio, Claude, Gemini, Zed AI, GitHub Copilot, Windsurf, Cursor. They provide assistance with explaining code, creating assignments, answering questions, speeding up development, debugging, refactoring, and commenting.

items.title: Free 1-Hour One-on-One Consultation & Weekly Post-Course Support
body: Free 1-hour consultation topics include development issues, app store publishing, job hunting, and mock interviews. To help students continue developing Apps after the course, Peter Pan welcomes weekly submissions of App projects for discussion. See <link1>Free 1-Hour One-on-One App Development Consultation</link1> and <link2>Neverland Course: Supporting Your App Development Journey for Life</link2>.

items.title: Free Advanced App Workshops and Ongoing Assignments
body: After the course ends, <link1>assignments continue</link1>, and various themed <link2>advanced App workshops</link2> are regularly offered to help everyone keep practicing and improving, becoming lifelong App wizards!

items.title: Learn Industry Collaboration Tools
body: Version control with GitHub, using GitHub, Medium, <link1>GitHub Pages</link1> & CakeResume to create <link2>App portfolios</link2> and resumes.
